MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:40pm to safely carry our repair works on our underground cable network located on Hillfoot Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:11pm on Saturday, 28 November 2020

We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:11pm on Saturday, 28 November 2020
